Package com.acm.server.controller

Class TeamController

java.lang.Object
com.acm.server.controller.TeamController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/team") public class TeamController extends Object
Controller class for handling requests related to the team functionality. This class is responsible for managing team-related operations. The base URL for this controller is ""/api"/team". Requires a TeamService instance for processing team-related requests.
Author:
Farid Masjedi

    • createTeam

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BaseResponseDto<TeamDto>> createTeam(@RequestBody TeamDto teamDto)
      Creates a new team.
      Parameters:
      teamDto - The TeamDto object containing the details of the team to be created.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the response with the created TeamDto object.

    • getTeam

      @GetMapping("/id/{id}") @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BaseResponseDto<TeamDto>> getTeam(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves the team information based on the provided team ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the team to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the response with the TeamDto object.

    • getTeam

      ResponseEntity containing the response with the TeamDto object.

    • updateStatus

      @PutMapping("/status") @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BaseResponseDto<TeamDto>> updateStatus(@RequestBody UpdateStatusRequest request)
      Updates the status of a team based on the provided UpdateStatusRequest object.
      Parameters:
      request - The UpdateStatusRequest object containing the team name and the new status.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the response with BaseResponseDto holding the TeamDto with updated status.

    • isNameUnique

      @GetMapping("/name/unique") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> isNameUnique(String teamName)
      Checks if the provided team name is unique.
      Parameters:
      teamName - The name of the team to check for uniqueness.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the response with a Boolean indicating the uniqueness of the team name.

    • getTeams

      @GetMapping @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BaseResponseDto<List<TeamDto>>> getTeams(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
      Retrieves a list of teams with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      page - The pagination information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the response with the list of TeamDto objects.
